ygData.subject: Re: Damage
ygData.msgSnippet: nope.  But I hit a new high today =).  Hit for 47.  hehe. -24 bonk Shado Nite ... From: Mifsud, Michael  To:

nope. But I hit a new high today =). Hit for 47. hehe.

-24 bonk Shado Nite
